job.title: Lead Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: <strong><u>Must Have<br></u></strong><ul><li>MS shop experience, azure, etc</li><li>Lead experience - mentoring devs, doesn't need to be in a true dev lead role currently but used to mentoring and being a leader<br></li></ul><strong><u>Day To Day<br></u></strong><ul><li>Lead kickoff and overview meetings with teams and assigns features to development teams.</li><li>Identify detailed features with acceptance criteria, develop estimates per feature, identify discrepancies, identify, and document risks and assumptions and complete a prototype if needed.</li><li>When working with feature teams, focus on improving the quality of interactions between the teams.</li><li>Be responsible for troubleshooting issues in non-production environments and with other teams to resolve any issues.</li><li>Play release manager and engineer roles during releases.</li></ul> #HybridRED, #OnsiteRED
